Did not occurr when I ran the tests in debug mode.
*** Bug 25697 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Fixed. The styled text widget will throw this exception when the specified 
style ranges are not within the current bounds of the text widget. It is 
possible that we are trying to update the viewer after the document has changed 
(since the painting is done asynchronously). The fix is simply to catch the 
exception and move on (as we will likely be updating the ranges again shortly).
